full_sentence: I am so surprised when people say 'I hate lesbians'

It's true, we all have our problems in life. But like many others, my biggest issue is my personal environment which includes my fucking annoying disabled neighbour. It's just terrible.

You're telling me that I can't use the term Koreaboos?? I've honestly had enough of arguing with randoms over things like this. I can use whatever term i want to describle THEM. It is not my fault that you think there is something sacred about words, get over yourself.
